text: Novosphingobium tardaugens is an oestradiol-degrading bacterium from the genus of Novosphingobium which has been isolated from activated sludge from a sewage treatment plant in Japan. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Novosphingobium tardaugens at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteria described in 2003 Category:Sphingomonadales
title: Novosphingobium tardaugens
